entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matane

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
